block.rats.rat_cage.desc0: Interact with while having a rat on your shoulder to deposit it in the cage
block.rats.rat_cage.desc1: Rats will breed with eachother while in the same cage
block.rats.rat_tube.desc0: Right click to place Rat Tube
block.rats.rat_tube.desc1: Right click Rat Tube to create an entrance
block.rats.rat_tube.desc2: Rats will only go inside Rat Tubes that have entrances
block.rats.garbage_pile.desc: Only rats can spawn on garbage blocks
block.rats.compressed_rat.desc: §o"In times like these we are thankful, but we must temper our thirst for for our pursuit bears wondrous fruit, some ideas must rot where they fall."
block.rats.upgrade_separator.desc: Throw a combined rat upgrade on top to shatter it
item.rats.rat_burger.desc: §o"Just don't ask them where the meat comes from."
item.rats.contaminated_food.desc0: A wild rodent has touched this food.
item.rats.contaminated_food.desc1: Not a good idea to eat this.
item.rats.cheese_stick.desc0: Use on a rat to bind it
item.rats.cheese_stick.desc1: Interact with an block to allow the rat to deposit or pick up items in it
item.rats.rat_upgrade_creative.desc: Rat cannot take damage except from owner
item.rats.rat_upgrade_platter.desc: §bRat will transfer entire stacks of items at a time
item.rats.rat_upgrade_crafting1.desc: §bRat will process crafting recipes while sitting on Rat Crafting Table
item.rats.rat_upgrade_blacklist0.desc: Rats will only pickup/transfer items that are not on this list
item.rats.rat_upgrade_whitelist0.desc: Rats will only pickup/transfer items that are on this list
item.rats.rat_upgrade_flight0.desc: Rats gain the ability to flap rudimentary wings and fly
item.rats.rat_upgrade_flight1.desc: Rats will move faster while flying and will not be bound the the constraints of land based travel
item.rats.rat_upgrade_flight2.desc: Pretty much turns rats into pigeons
item.rats.rat_upgrade_ender0.desc: Rats gain the ability to teleport at will
item.rats.rat_upgrade_ender2.desc: Turns rats black with glowing purple eyes
item.rats.rat_upgrade_lumberjack0.desc: Rats will fell trees when set to the 'Harvest' command
item.rats.rat_upgrade_miner0.desc: Rats will attempt to mine targeted blocks in the list when set to the 'Harvest' command
item.rats.rat_upgrade_farmer0.desc: Rats will any plant held seeds or saplings when set to the 'Harvest' command
item.rats.rat_upgrade_farmer1.desc: Rats will use bonemeal on crops and saplings as well
item.rats.rat_upgrade_farmer2.desc: Rats will randomly place any other held blocks
item.rats.rat_upgrade_breeder0.desc: Rats will any held food to breeed animals when set to the 'Harvest' command
item.rats.rat_upgrade_breeder1.desc: Rats will pickup food items from chests
item.rats.rat_upgrade_fisherman0.desc: Rats will move to water sources and start fishing
item.rats.rat_upgrade_fisherman1.desc: Rats can catch fish, junk and treasure items
§dRight click with upgrade to add components
item.rats.rat_upgrade_feral_bite.desc: Rat attack deals 5 extra damage, inflicts plague and poison debuf
item.rats.rat_upgrade_buccaneer0.desc: Rat gains an automatic firing cannon
item.rats.rat_upgrade_asbestos0.desc: Rat will not take damage from:
item.rats.rat_upgrade_underwater0.desc: Rat will not take damage from:
item.rats.rat_upgrade_poison0.desc: Rat will not take damage from:
item.rats.rat_upgrade_damage_protection0: Rat will not take damage from:
item.rats.rat_upgrade_archeologist0.desc: Researches held item, transforms it into Ratlantean artifact if possible
item.rats.rat_upgrade_christmas1.desc: Rat will gift a random present every hour
item.rats.rat_upgrade_christmas2.desc: Rat will hold gift or put it in chest below
item.rats.rat_upgrade_ore_doubling0.desc: Rat will eat ore blocks and create §o"nuggets"
item.rats.rat_upgrade_ore_doubling1.desc: §o"nuggets"§r§7 can then be smelted for associated ore item
item.rats.rat_upgrade_ore_doubling2.desc: Rat will not deposit any held ore block into chest, will eat it instead
item.rats.rat_upgrade_energy.desc0: Rat will transfer energy instead of items
item.rats.rat_upgrade_bucket0.desc: Rat will transfer fluids instead of items
item.rats.rat_upgrade_bucket1.desc: Rat will transfer 1000 mb at a time
item.rats.rat_upgrade_big_bucket0.desc: Rat will transfer fluids instead of items
item.rats.rat_upgrade_big_bucket1.desc: Rat will transfer 5000 mb at a time
item.rats.rat_upgrade_aristocrat0.desc: Rat drops Tiny Coins randomly or when killing enemies
item.rats.rat_upgrade_milker0.desc: Rat will milk cows when set to Harvest
item.rats.rat_upgrade_milker1.desc: Rat will transfer fluids instead of items
item.rats.rat_upgrade_milker2.desc: Rat will transfer 1000 mb at a time
item.rats.rat_upgrade_tnt1.desc: May kill rat and injure any nearby entities
item.rats.rat_upgrade_tnt_survivor1.desc: Will not damage rat or allies directly
item.rats.rat_upgrade_tnt_survivor2.desc: Rat will not take damage from:
item.rats.rat_upgrade_placer0.desc: Rats will place any held blocks when set to the 'Harvest' command
item.rats.rat_upgrade_placer1.desc: Rats will place blocks at its 'Home' Position
item.rats.rat_upgrade_shears0.desc: Rat will shear sheep, mooshrooms, etc. when set to 'Harvest' command
item.rats.rat_upgrade_voodoo0.desc: Rat takes damage instead of its owner, only when within a certain distance
item.rats.rat_upgrade_voodoo1.desc: Damage is evenly distributed amongst multiple rats with this upgrade
item.rats.rat_upgrade_gemcutter0.desc: Can cut gems into specific shapes and forms
item.rats.rat_upgrade_aquatic0.desc: Rat gains scales and the ability to swim adeptly
item.rats.rat_upgrade_aquatic2.desc: Pretty much turns rats into fish
item.rats.rat_upgrade_enchanter0.desc: Rat will enchant any held item
item.rats.rat_upgrade_disenchanter0.desc: Rat will disenchant any enchanted held item
item.rats.rat_upgrade_no_flute0.desc: Rat will not listen to flute commands
item.rats.rat_upgrade_dragon0.desc: Rat can fly and breathe fire
item.rats.rat_upgrade_dragon1.desc: Rat will not take fire damage
item.rats.rat_flute.desc0: Commands all tamed rats within the local area
item.rats.rat_flute.desc1: Sneak and use to change command
item.rats.piper_hat.desc: Wild rats will no longer fear you when worn
item.rats.chunky_cheese_token.desc1: Right click anywhere to open a portal to Ratlantis
item.rats.rat_capture_net.desc: Rounds up all tamed rats within 30 blocks into one neat sack!
item.rats.archeologist_hat.desc: Rare drop from Husks or skeletons in jungles
item.rats.rat_fez.desc0: Standard Headwear of the Sec-rat society...
item.rats.rat_fez.desc1: §mDefinitely not throwing shade at another mod
item.rats.plague_doctor_mask.desc: Reduces chance of getting plague from rats on contact
item.rats.black_death_mask.desc: Plague Rats will no longer target you when worn
item.rats.purifying_liquid.desc: Cures mobs with plague and zombie villagers
item.rats.plague_doctorate.desc0: Transforms a villager into a Plague Doctor
item.rats.plague_heal_chance.desc: Has a %s percent chance to remove plague effect
item.rats.rat_toga.desc0: Interact on a rat to equip it with a toga
item.rats.rat_toga.desc1: Interact again with toga to de-equip
item.rats.arcane_technology.desc0: §o"Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic."
item.rats.arcane_technology.desc1: Who knows what magnificent marvels the ancient civilization of Ratlantis created?
item.rats.ratlantean_flame.desc: Imbued with the ancient souls of the Ratlanteans... and Cheese.
item.rats.vial_of_sentience.desc: A serum that can, §lin theory§r§7, reverse the de-evolution of a Ratlantean.
item.rats.psionic_rat_brain.desc0: §o"The inner machinations of my mind are an enigma."
item.rats.psionic_rat_brain.desc1: A powerful mind capable of tinkering with the very fabric of reality.
entity.rats.rat.command.wander.desc: The rat is free to run around as it pleases.
entity.rats.rat.command.sit.desc: The rat will stay in this exact location.
entity.rats.rat.command.follow.desc: The rat will follow its owner obediently.
entity.rats.rat.command.hunt.desc: The rat will kill mobs while it has more than half health, and place their remains in a deposit container. Use the §6Cheese Staff§r to mark deposit containers.
entity.rats.rat.command.gather.desc: The rat will try to pick up dropped items and place them in a deposit container. Use the §6Cheese Staff§r to mark deposit containers.
entity.rats.rat.command.harvest.desc: The rat will break grasses and harvest crops, and place them in a deposit container. If the rat has a §6Miner or Lumberjack§r Upgrade, it will mine blocks or fell trees, respectively. Use the §6Cheese Staff§r to mark deposit containers.
entity.rats.rat.command.transport.desc: The rat will move items from one container to another. Use the §6Cheese Staff§r to mark deposit and pickup containers.
entity.rats.rat.dismount_instructions: Sneak and punch air to remove rats from shoulder
entity.rats.rat.staff.no_rat: Staff is not bound to any rat
entity.rats.rat.staff.set_home_point: Set home point for rat to %s
entity.rats.rat.tamed_by_other: §cThis rat is already tamed by another.
container.rat_crafting_table.rat_desc: Requires a rat with a crafting upgrade above the table to function
container.rat_crafting_table.input_desc: Place the item to be crafted here
modifier.ratty.desc: §oRat Patootie§r\nRandomly summons rats when used. If used in a fight, summoned rats will try to defend you!
modifier.plague_shot.desc: §oI Am Become Death§r\nSummons a plague cloud on use, which deals half the damage of the tool!
modifier.disease.desc: §oFleas on Rats!§r\nOpponents get inflicted with Plague.
item.rats.cheese.jei_desc: Used to tame rats. Throw cheese on the ground repeatedly near a wild rat to tame one.
item.rats.cheese_stick.jei_desc: Used to set rat deposit and pickup inventories and rat home points. Click on a rat with it to bind, then click on a block or inventory(chest, furnace, machine, etc) for more item transport related options.
item.rats.rat_flute.jei_desc: Used to command rats en-masse. Warning: will result in all nearby tamed rats to you stopping their task and following the set command. Shift-click to change the set command.
item.rats.rat_upgrade_basic.jei_desc: The most basic rat upgrade. While it has no effects in itself, it is a crafting ingredient required for advanced upgrades.
item.rats.rat_upgrade_chef.jei_desc: Rats with the chef upgrade will cook any held item. Once the item is cooked, they will either try and drop it in an inventory below them, or simply throw it on the ground. This upgrade also gives the rat the skill set required to make a few select delicacies.
item.rats.rat_upgrade_archeologist.jei_d: Rats with the archeologist upgrade will research their held item, trying to discover Ratlantean artifacts from it. Once an artifact is discovered, they will either try and drop it in an inventory below them, or simply throw it on the ground.
item.rats.rat_upgrade_whitelist.jei_desc: Rats will only pickup or hold items that are on this list. To access it, click the upgrade and deposit the whitelisted items inside.
item.rats.rat_upgrade_blacklist.jei_desc: Rats will only pickup or hold items that are not on this list. To access it, click the upgrade and deposit the blacklisted items inside.
Rats will only pickup or hold items that are not on this list. To access it, click the upgrade and deposit the blacklisted items inside.
block.rats.rat_trap.jei_desc: Place a food item(especially cheese) in the rat trap to attract wild rats. When they die inside the trap, it needs to be reset.
block.rats.rat_cage.jei_desc: While having a rat sitting on your head or shoulder (sneak + click a rat), click on the cage to deposit the rat inside. Click again to release the rat. Rat cages connect to eachother, and two opposite gender rats in the same cage have a chance to breed.
block.rats.rat_crafting_table.jei_desc: Used in autocrafting, a rat crafting table requires a rat with the Rat Upgrade: Crafting sitting above the table to function. Then simply place the desired item in the first slot, and the materials required below it. This process can be automated with rats transporting and gathering items.
advancements.rats.root.title: Rats
advancements.rats.rattrap.title: An Effective Classic
advancements.rats.piper.title: Pay the Piper
advancements.rats.cauldron_milk.title: Curdling Time
advancements.rats.cauldron_milk.descript: Pour milk into a cauldron and wait for it to turn to cheese
advancements.rats.cheese.title: We've Forgotten the Crackers!
advancements.rats.cheese.description: Turn a Block of Cheese into four Cheese
advancements.rats.tame_rat.title: An Unlikely Alliance
advancements.rats.tame_rat.description: Tame a rat by dropping cheese near it repeatedly until it is full
advancements.rats.rat_cage.title: Despite All My Rage...
advancements.rats.rat_cage.description: Craft a rat cage, used for breeding rats
advancements.rats.cheese_stick.title: Cheese Touch
advancements.rats.cheese_stick.descripti: Craft a Cheese Staff, used for setting drop-off and pickup locations for tamed rats
advancements.rats.rat_upgrade_platter.de: Craft Rat Upgrade: Platter, used to make rats transport an entire stack of items at a time
advancements.rats.rat_upgrade_basic.desc: Craft Rat Upgrade: Basic, used to craft advanced rat upgrades
advancements.rats.rat_upgrade_strength.d: Craft Rat Upgrade: Strength, making your rat pack a powerful punch
advancements.rats.rat_upgrade_warrior.de: Craft Rat Upgrade: Warrior, making your rat stringer, have armor and higher health
advancements.rats.rat_upgrade_god.title: Whats a Man to a King?
advancements.rats.rat_upgrade_god.descri: Craft Rat Upgrade: God, turning your rat into an almost unstoppable killing machine
advancements.rats.rat_upgrade_crafting.d: Craft Rat Upgrade: Crafting, the first step in rat auto-crafting
advancements.rats.rat_upgrade_chef.title: The Rat is the Cook!
advancements.rats.rat_upgrade_chef.descr: Craft a Rat Upgrade: Chef, which makes rats cook held items
advancements.rats.chef_toque.title: Anyone Can Cook
advancements.rats.chef_toque.description: Obtain one of two rare gourmet foods prepared by a rat chef
advancements.rats.rat_upgrade_flight.des: Craft a Rat Upgrade: Flight, enabling rats to take to the skies
advancements.rats.token.title: What lottery? The lottery, that's what lottery! Are you stupid? Only lottery that matters! Oh my god smell that air!
advancements.rats.token.description: Obtain a Chunky Cheese Token from a rat! Good job!
advancements.rats.ratlantis.title: Ratlantis!
advancements.rats.ratlantis.description: Use Chunky Cheese Token anywhere to create a portal to Ratlantis. Enter through the portal!
advancements.rats.rat_upgrade_archeologi: Craft Rat Upgrade: Archeologist, enabling an alternative to Ratlantis
advancements.rats.ratglove_petals.title: Flower Power
advancements.rats.ratglove_petals.descri: Craft Ratglove Petals from nine Ratglove Flowers
advancements.rats.ratlantean_spirit.titl: Ashes of a Trillion Dead Souls
advancements.rats.ratlantean_spirit.desc: Encounter the long dead ghost of a Ratlantean
advancements.rats.feral_ratlantean.title: Going Native
advancements.rats.feral_ratlantean.descr: Encounter what now remains of Ratlantis' once-noble denizens
advancements.rats.gem_of_ratlantis.title: Closer to Godliness
advancements.rats.gem_of_ratlantis.descr: Craft the Gem of Ratlantis from Ratglove Petals and Emeralds
advancements.rats.marbled_cheese_golem_c: Craft a Ratlantean Automaton Core! Now, place a Raltantean Automaton Head on top and surround the core with Marbled Cheese!
Craft a Rat Upgrade: Ratinator, bringing a deadly rat cyborg to life
advancements.rats.upgrade_combiner.title: MAXIMUM POWER!!!
advancements.rats.upgrade_combiner.descr: Craft a Rat Upgrade Combiner, and start mixing upgrades together
advancements.rats.vial_of_sentience.titl: The Risks I Took Were Calculated...
advancements.rats.vial_of_sentience.desc: Create a Vial of Conciousness with Ratlantean Spirit Flame and Feral Rat Claws. Make sure to throw it at a Feral Ratlantean!
advancements.rats.neoratlantean.title: But Man am I Bad at Math
advancements.rats.rat_upgrade_psychic.de: Craft a Rat Upgrade: Psychic, and have your very own psychic rat
advancements.rats.pirat.title: Are You Ready Kids?
advancements.rats.pirat.description: Encounter the Pirat, a swashbuckling, sea-faring rat
Craft a Rat Upgrade: Buccaneer, giving unnecessary 16th century firepower to a rat
advancements.rats.rat_cage_decoration.de: Place a rat cage decoration in a Rat Cage
advancements.rats.rat_upgrade_nonbelieve: Whats a God to a Nonbeliever?
Craft a Rat Upgrade: Nonbeliever, the one rat upgrade to rule them all
advancements.rats.rat_music_disc.title: Rat Tunes
advancements.rats.rat_music_disc.descrip: Get a music disc by killing a Pied Piper with a rat
advancements.rats.contaminated_food.desc: Find disgusting contaminated food left behind by a rat
advancements.rats.plague.title: Down with the Sickness!
advancements.rats.plague.description: Catch the plague from a Plague Rat
advancements.rats.plague_doctor.title: I AM THE CURE!
advancements.rats.plague_doctor.descript: Find a Plague Doctor in a village
advancements.rats.plague_cure.title: The Medieval Treatment
advancements.rats.plague_cure.descriptio: Find a possible cure for the plague
advancements.rats.black_death.title: Dance Macabre!
advancements.rats.black_death.descriptio: Encounter the Black Death, a possessed Plague Doctor summoned by a lightning strike
advancements.rats.defeat_black_death.tit: Do Not Go Quietly Into the Night
